short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the comment boards a little less ugly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension only works on Dan-Ball comment boards (https://dan-ball.jp/en/bbs).

Makes image, video (YouTube included), and sound files view-able; removes the third-party "jump" links; changes all text to a more easily readable font; and a lot of other things. Simply, this extension makes the comment boards easier to use.
